SELECT TEV.ES_VOLUME_LEFTSIZE esVolumeLeftsize, TEV.ES_VOLUME_NAME esVolumeName, TEV.ES_VOLUME_ID esVolumeId, TEA.ES_ARCHIVE_NAME esArchiveName
FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_ESONIC_VOL ORDER BY ES_VOLUME_ID ) TEV, TB_ESONIC_ARCHIVE TEA WHERE TEA.ES_ARCHIVE_ID = #{esArchiveId} AND TO_NUMBER(TEV.ES_VOLUME_LEFTSIZE) > TO_NUMBER(#{esFileSize}) AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT TO_NUMBER(ES_VOLUME_LEFTSIZE) - TO_NUMBER(#{esCreateFileSize}) + TO_NUMBER(( SELECT ES_FILE_SIZE FROM TB_ESONIC_CONT WHERE ES_CONTENT_ID = #{esContentId} )) as LEFTSIZE FROM TB_ESONIC_VOL WHERE ES_VOLUME_ID = # {esVolumeId}
